item.title: About Me
item.description: Q: Who am I? こんにちは！私の名前はスニルです。 As of now, I am a student and also a security researcher (heh! such a cool name) sepcialising in malware reverse engineering Q: What am i doing? I started off by reading the holy book Practical Malware Analysis book and later expanded my interest with certs and courses like: Practical Malware Analysis And Triage (PMAT) by HuskyHacks from TCM Academy Zero2Automated: Advanced Malware Analysis by Offset Training Solutions OpenSecurityTraining2 (OST2) courses Windows Malware Analysis for Hedgehogs - Beginner Training by Karsten Hahn Q: What on earth is this blog?

item.title: Zero2Auto: Ch03-Practical Analysis Challenge (Part-III)
item.description: Yo Yo Yo!!! What’s up guys? Welcome back.. and i hope you all are having a nice time :) In this last part of analysing challenge binary from Z2A: Ch03 (Practical Analysis). We gonna take look at mighty capabilities this binary hiding within it. So, let’s get started Inside main() fig01. decompiled main() of stage03 All this stage does is display a message box and exit fig02. message prompted when running stage03 Conclusion gotcha guys, i was making the hype about satge03 capabilties, jokes apart this binary just shows a message box and exit.

item.title: Zero2Auto: Ch03-Practical Analysis Challenge (Part-II)
item.description: I encourage you to follow this writeup along with your analysis Yo Yo!! Welcome back, in the part-II of analysing the challenge binary from Z2A: Ch03 (Practical Analysis) we gonna take a thorough look inside the second payload extracted from .rsrc section and injected into another process of stage01 (main_bin.exe). So, let’s get started from the main of this stage.. Stage02: Extracted from resource section of main_bin.exe Inside main() fig1. decompiled main() of stage02_1 first gonna grab the file path of itself using GetModuleFileNameA(), to get the executable/file name using sub_404A23 aka strtok(identified by flirt in cutter) using a loop

item.title: Zero2Auto: Ch03-Practical Analysis Challenge (Part-I)
item.description: Yo! What is up guys, This post is walktrough of challenge binary(Chapter 03: Practical Analysis) from Zero2Auto course. This challenge tries to get you comfortable with reversing topics by covering variety of topics, to name a few, API hashing, anti-debugging, malware authors fav. PEB manipulation, process injection, thread context hijacking, basic unpacking, crypto… and so on, that’s why i wanted to cover this binary In this Part-I of this series we’ll walkthrough the base binary(stage01) ie.
